Disease.Name: ALPORT SYNDROME
Disease.Synonym: ALPORT SYNDROME; NEPHROPATHY AND DEAFNESS, X-LINKED
Disease.Summary: rare ;X-linked dominant; mutation in the collagen, type IV, alpha-5 gene

symtomp.symptom: eye defect beginning in infancy or childhood
